QuestData.Title: The Void-Gate
QuestData.Description: My 'master' is an idiot, but you look like you've got some smarts in that oddly-shaped head.$B$BListen up, the Twisting Nether is a chaotic abyss, and things work differently there. I've felt some disturbances, and they don't bode well for any of us.$B$BYes, there are things happening here, in Draenor, that are causing ripples in the nether. No, don't try to wrap your head around how that works, you'll only hurt yourself.$B$BIt's simple: bring me a Void-Gate Key, and maybe I can stop the bad things.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a Void-Gate Key in the Shadowmoon Burial Grounds.
QuestData.CompletionText: You do know that any time you waste talking to me brings us closer to doom, right?
